pages.text: You can find Netherrack Ardite Ore in all Nether biomes at within the +25 to +45 altitude. $(br2) Mineable with $(l)$(4)Netherite mining level$() Tools: $(li)Netherite Pickaxe $(li)Osmium Pickaxe $(li)Osmium Paxel.

You can find Netherrack Osmium Ore in all Nether biomes at within the +35 to +60 altitude. $(br2) Mineable with $(l)$(4)Netherite mining level$() Tools: $(li)Netherite Pickaxe $(li)Osmium Pickaxe $(li)Osmium Paxel.
